descriptors.name: wisun_cli
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC CLI
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN CLI (Command-Line Interface) sample application allows developers to easily evaluate the Wi-SUN stack APIs. The Wi-SUN command line interface provides a serial interface to a number of the Wi-SUN stack functions. For example, it can be used to connect the Wi-SUN device to a Wi-SUN border router and exchange IP packets.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4173a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_rcp
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - RCP
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN RCP (radio coprocessor) application provides a radio interface to a Linux host. It is meant to be paired with wsbrd (Wi-SUN Network implementation for Linux) to run as a Linux border router device.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4173a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_empty
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Empty
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Empty sample application is a bare-bones application. This application can be used as a template to develop a Wi-SUN application.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_ping
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Ping
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Ping sample application demonstrates how to use the Wi-SUN application framework and the POSIX-like socket API to implement a basic ping application.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_udp_server
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC UDP Server
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN UDP Server sample application provides a simple echo server implementation based on the UDP protocol. The sample application creates a UDP socket where every incoming packets are echoed back to the sender. The UDP Server leverages the POSIX-like socket component on top of the Wi-SUN stack.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_udp_client
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC UDP Client
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN UDP Client sample application provides a simple client implementation based on the UDP protocol. The sample application operates with a command-line interface to create, close, read or write sockets. The UDP Client leverages the POSIX-like socket component on top of the Wi-SUN stack.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_tcp_server
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC TCP Server
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN TCP Server sample application provides a simple echo server implementation based on the connection oriented TCP protocol. The sample application creates a TCP socket where every incoming packets are echoed back to the sender. The TCP Server leverages the POSIX-like socket component on top of the Wi-SUN stack.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_tcp_client
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC TCP Client
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN TCP Client sample application provides a simple client implementation based on the connection oriented TCP protocol. The sample application operates with a command-line interface to create, close, read or write sockets. The TCP Client leverages the POSIX-like socket component on top of the Wi-SUN stack.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_meter
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Meter
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Meter sample application demonstrates the use of a UDP socket to emulate a metering-like application. The Meter sends sensor measurements (temperature and relative humidity from the SI7021 I2C sensor and dummy lux values) to a Collector device in the same Wi-SUN network.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_collector
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Collector
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Collector sample application demonstrates a data collector implementation on top of a UDP client socket to emulate a metering-like application.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_coap_meter
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC CoAP Meter
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN CoAP Meter sample application demonstrates the use of the CoAP (Constrained Application Protocol) protocol to emulate a metering-like application. The CoAP Meter purpose is to send sensor measurements to a CoAP Collector device in the same Wi-SUN network.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_coap_collector
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC CoAP Collector
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN CoAP Collector sample application demonstrates the use of the CoAP (Constrained Application Protocol) to emulate a metering-like application. The CoAP Collector purpose is to retrieve measurements from the devices running the Wi-SUN CoAP Meter application in the same Wi-SUN network.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none

descriptors.name: wisun_network_measurement
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN - SoC Network Measurement
descriptors.description: The Wi-SUN Network Measurement application provides a performance measurement solution based on the ping mechanism.

properties.value: brd4163a brd4164a brd4170a brd4172a brd4253a brd4254a brd4270a brd4270b brd4271a brd4272a com.silabs.board.none
